name: Blood Resonance Reference Sheet
description:
Blood Resonance Reference Sheet

A complete reference guide for historical and modern Blood Resonances for your Vampire the Masquerade game! Spice up your Feeding Scenes and add depth to your Kindreds potential victims.

If you enjoy these, please check out us out wherever podcasts are found, and take a peek at our Patreon if you'd like to support our show.

BLANKBODIES.com

Sheet made for Episode 9: Blood Resonances - Dick Blood Medicine Woman
